column4: Flannel can you look at this link for this modem I want to buy http://www.trendnet.com/products/proddetail.asp?prod=110_TFM-560X&cat=51

external modems are always compatible, it's PCI ones you need to worry about
because they might be a winmodem

the specs were throwing me off
some pages said it would work some didn't
How do these modems exactly work are they connected wia serial?
yes rs-232 serial, and good old standard AT command set
so there isn't really any additional software I need to get it going right?
is it straight plug and play?
Thank god bye bye winmodem. now I can download my updates and sleep better
Winmodems that's what I hate about them u never know what update will screw up the coing
